name: User could not register with invalid password (less than 6 symbols)
description: Try to register new user with invalid password (less than 6 symbols) and check that Error is shown

steps.name: Enter name yuayvkrzbp to 'Name' input field
Enter email zsytcdd@orhzlbi.com to 'Email' input field
Enter password kCy41 to 'Password' input field
Check if element [[ChromeDriver: chrome on MAC (fb1a068c9749b96d13f06195ad9d5955)] -> xpath: .//p[text() ='Некорректный пароль']] is visible
Send POST request to "/api/auth/login" without auth
Deserialize response as ExtendedUser object and add password
